full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal

### Procurement Overview
The Department of National Defence seeks to procure a Mobile Communications Vehicle for delivery to QETE, Ottawa, Ontario. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number W8476-226506/A, dated 23 March 2022.

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01003440
* **Solicitation Number:** W8476-226506/B
* **Publication Date:** August 26, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2022, at 14:00 EDT
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

### Procurement Criteria

* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is open to suppliers from countries participating in the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other bilateral and plurilateral agreements (accords commerciaux).
* **Selection Criteria:** Suppliers are expected to meet the required standards to receive a contract award.
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence (Ministère de la défense nationale)
* **Contact Information:** James, Brian (brian.james3@forces.gc.ca)

### Contract Overview
* **GSIN:** N2320 (Trucks and Truck Tractors, Wheeled)
* **Description:** A single mobile communications vehicle is required for delivery to QETE, Ottawa, Ontario.
* **Delivery Date:** 120 days after contract award
* **Security Requirements:** None

### Debriefing and Evaluation

* **Debriefing Requests:** Suppliers may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made within 15 working days after notification of an unsuccessful bid.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Suppliers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements of the mobile communications vehicle.

### Terms and Conditions

* **Documentation:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Terms and Conditions:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Attachments
The solicitation package, including terms and conditions, may be accessed at:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/ea8b73d1aadeeccd954981ad59b22e7c/en_rfp_w
